name: Light (itch) (BearVanilla)
description:
ART / AUDIO / FONT by Lemon125131514
CODE by me (BearVanilla)

CONTROLS:
W A S D - move
I - turn on/off your lighter

DETAILS:
A grid based game where you have to escape the lightless dungeons.  Find the key to unlock the stairs leading to your freedom but watch out for bottomless holes and traps.  The floors are brittle and stepping on them will eventually make them rot away.  Use your lighter to see what's around you and refill it with the fires found around the dungeon.

THEME:
Are those fires and sparklys good or bad.  Touch them and find out.
